member.name: P:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.GraphQLNamedQueryRequest.NamedQuery
member.summary: Used to store some graphql query on the server, and then the client only needs to submit the name of that query to reduce the size of the network request

member.name: F:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.Json.GraphQLNamedQueryRequestJsonConverter._operationNameKey
member.summary: Name for the operation name parameter. See https://github.com/graphql/graphql-over-http/blob/master/spec/GraphQLOverHTTP.md#request-parameters.

member.name: F:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.Json.GraphQLNamedQueryRequestJsonConverter._queryKey
member.summary: Name for the query parameter. See https://github.com/graphql/graphql-over-http/blob/master/spec/GraphQLOverHTTP.md#request-parameters.

member.name: F:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.Json.GraphQLNamedQueryRequestJsonConverter._variablesKey
member.summary: Name for the variables parameter. See https://github.com/graphql/graphql-over-http/blob/master/spec/GraphQLOverHTTP.md#request-parameters.

member.name: F:OrchardCore.Apis.GraphQL.Json.GraphQLNamedQueryRequestJsonConverter._extensionsKey
member.summary: Name for the extensions parameter. See https://github.com/graphql/graphql-over-http/blob/master/spec/GraphQLOverHTTP.md#request-parameters.
